arrange-collection.header: Who would you like to nominate?

someone-else-id-type.title: If the Home Office approves this request, a letter of authority will be posted. The person collecting your BRP must bring this letter, the identity document selected above and your passport containing the vignette (sticker) to the Post Office when they collect your BRP.

someone-else-group.title: Provide details of the person you want to collect your BRP. The nominated person must be over 18 years old and hold a valid passport, EU national ID card or BRP.â€‹

someone-else-reason.header: Why do you need someone else to collect your BRP?

exit-cancel-request.header: You don't need to use this service
exit-cancel-request.subheader: You do not need to cancel your request for a nominated person to collect your BRP. If you are still unable to collect your BRP yourself, you can nominate a new person to collect it for you.

contact-details.header: How should we contact you about your BRP?

address.title: If you do not have an email address, what address should we use to contact you by post?

contact-details.delay: Asking to be contacted by post will add a further 2 days on to our response time. If you provide an email address we can get back to you sooner.

check-details.header: Check the details you have provided
check-details.subheader: If any information is incorrect, you can change it here.

org-help.title: Are you completing this form on behalf of the BRP holder?
org-help.explanation: Friends, relatives, employers, charity workers and lawyers, for example, can complete this form on behalf of the BRP holder.

org-details-group.subheader: We will attempt to contact the BRP holder directly. We will only use these details to contact you if needed.

other-person.title: Details of person nominated to collect BRP

someone-else-confirmation.paragraph: We will review the information you have given. Once we've done this, we will send you a letter saying that your nominated person can collect your BRP from the Post Office. Do not send them to collect the BRP without the letter.

confirmation.header: Thank you, we have received your information.
confirmation.email: We have sent an email to
confirmation.email_part_two: to confirm receipt of your enquiry.

para.one: We shall review the information you have provided.
para.two: We consider each case individually and will respond to you as soon as possible. If you provided an email address, this will be within 5 working days.
para.three: We will let you know whether your nominated person has been approved to collect your BRP. If you want multiple BRPs to be collected by someone else, you will need to nominate a person to collect each BRP separately.

para.one: If you provided an email address, you should hear from us in the next working day, We will tell you if you need to apply for a replacement BRP.
If you provided an email address, we will contact you in the next working day to tell you what to do.
para.two: As you are outside the UK, you may need to apply for a temporary visa to get back to the UK.
para.three: We will tell you if you need to apply for a temporary visa when we contact you.
